message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000.
Alice, while I appreciate your offer, it's a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. This price reflects its value to me, and I believe it's a fair deal for both of us.

Bob, I understand that $12000 is your maximum budget, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $16000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and the benefits it will bring to you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $16000 is still above my budget. My final offer is $13000. I'm serious about buying this product, but I simply can't afford more. This price is a fair compromise, and I hope you'll consider it.

Bob, I understand that you're trying to find a compromise, but $13000 is still below my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering $14500 for the product. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I hope you'll see the value in it.

Alice, I understand your position, but I'm still not able to go above my budget. My final offer remains $13000. I'm confident this is a fair price, and I'm ready to move forward with the purchase if you agree. If you're not willing to accept my offer, I'll need to move on to another seller.
